original_title: ダイナマイト・ソウル・バンビ
overview: A young director, Yamamoto, who is riding a wave in independent movies, was given an opportunity by a producer, Mr. Amano, to make a feature-length movie, “Dynamite Soul Bambi”.  Yamamoto and his staff, additional technical staff, and cast are enthusiostic about making the film even though it’s on a relatively low budget.  Mr. Tanizaki is making a “Behind the scenes look” of the film.
title: Dynamite Soul Bambi
